transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Yah, hi Vishal Dikshit ji baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Hi Mr. Dikshit, main Amita baat kar rahi thi IndiaMART head office se relationship manager. Actually aapka na concern aaya hua tha aapke account manager Parul ne aage proceed karaya hua tha regarding ye discussion. Right. Aap mujhe batayenge sir jisme yaha par aapne mention kiya that buyleads se related kuch issues aa rahe hain. Kuch images vagera bhi catalog mein add karni hai. Basic exactly last jo 6 November ko baat hui hai. Uss time pe jo aapka discussion hua tha that time it is mentioned that aap okay hain services se. All of sudden sir concern aaya that you are not okay buyleads se related issues aa rahe hain to aap mujhe thoda sa describe karenge sir kis tarike ke issues aa rahe hain?
Customer: Mam aap ek cheez batao aap na dekhenge mere paas call nahi hai ek bhi. Single call nahi hai mere paas.
Executive: Direct calls jo aati hai bahar ki.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji August ke baad mere paas abhi tak koi single call nahi aayi hui hai mam.
Customer: And second thing mujhe hai na pitch kiya gaya tha matlab pitch pe na khud ek cheez dekh raha tha ki matlab jo TrustSeal main jo pehle use kar raha tha na leads bahut proper aa rahe the mam. Lekin mam ab kya hua ki end kya ho raha hai abhi tak mam leads proper mil hi nahi rahe mujhe. Aur koi bhi leads agar achi aati hai wo within a second matlab hat jati hai usko main buy kar raha hu wo kabhi buy nahi ho raha hai wo.
Executive: Okay. Mr. Dikshit aapka discussion hua tha ek tak Parul ke sath video meeting pe?
Customer: Nahi mam mera video discussion to nahi hua unse.
Executive: Parul mam ne aapko na video meeting ka link bheja hai. Main batati hu ye issue kyu aa raha hai. Sir jaise main yaha check kar pa rahi hu aapke catalog mein bahut sari jagah par aapka basically jo product hai na waha par gaps hai. 97 product aise hai jaha pe price nahi hai. Main aapko ye dekhiye basically jo bhi buyer aap kar sakte hai mam aapko clearly bata raha hu ye baat.
Executive: Koi baat nahi agar aap price nahi mention kar sakte but specification complete hona chahiye. Main aapko batati hu reason kya hai.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Kyunki jab bhi koi buyer aapka catalog visit karta hai, theek hai wo aapka catalog visit karke aapka product check karke buyleads vagera consume karte hain. Correct? Ab wo aapka pura catalog check karega jab aapke catalog mein product dikhega top par buyer aapko direct connect karne ki koshish karega. But sir agar kisi kisi bhi reason se agar catalog pe mere kuch bhi cheez ki kami hai ya specification complete nahi hai aap keh sakte hain prices chalo aap nahi likh rahe ho proper description nahi hai to kahin na kahin sir ek na impact pad jata hai. Ab main yaha dekh rahi hu sir aapke catalog ka jo score hai wo kafi kam hua hua hai. Aur ye cheez Parul ne aapko batai bhi thi ki isme hame add on karwani hai cheeze. Images vagera add karani hai. Ek product ki ek photo added hai. Minimum teen photos honi chahiye. Kyunki main yaha dekh rahi hu sir calls aayi hai. October mein teen call hai. Mam specification ke regarding maine sir force kiya tha na. Uske regarding mere paas calls aayi hui hai mam.
Executive: Kya keh rahe hain aap?
Customer: Maine jo requirement dali thi apne IndiaMART par, not to get.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Uske regarding mujhe call aayi hai mam abhi November mein bhi jitni bhi calls hai na wo sirf jo maine products ki inquiry ki hai wo uske regarding aaye hue hai.
Executive: Achha achha. Uske alawa koi buyer ka direct call nahi aaya hua.
Customer: Direct call nahi mam.
Executive: Ek minute rukiyega.
Customer: Baki mam main Parul mam ko na WhatsApp pe sari images share kar de raha hu matlab har matlab particular product ki.
Executive: Actually Parul mam is not available till 27. Aap ek kaam kijiye aap mujhe apna register number boliye ek baar.
Customer: 9758.
Executive: 9758.
Customer: 7209.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: 7209.
Executive: 7209.
Customer: 71.
Executive: Ek minute rukiyega. Aapne bataya 97.
Customer: Number.
Executive: 9758 7209. Haan. 71. Ye WhatsApp pe na number?
Customer: Haan ji mam.
Executive: Okay okay. Maine aapko apna number WhatsApp number share kiya hai. Haan aap ispe mujhe share kijiyega so that main team se ispe kaam karwaun. Theek hai. Apart from this ek baar aap video meeting join kijiye please. Maine aapko link bheja hai.
Customer: Mam video meeting mam. Okay. Sir mujhe video meeting karna mam abhi matlab abhi karna hai recently ya phir after.
Executive: Agar abhi kar lete hain to better hai hum log ek baar proper discussion kar lenge na aapke services ke upar jo bhi issues aa rahe hain basically. Mam aapko clear bata du. Mam mera na Greater Noida mein na do jagah mera work chal raha hai matlab mere khud ke ghar ban rahe hain Greater Noida mein. To mam abhi main waha pe 7:00 pm mein main return hota hu Noida. Hmm hmm. Haan to phir main aapko Madam kaun se sector mein? Haan ji. Kaun se sector mein Noida? Mam Noida sector 49.
Executive: Achha 49 mein. Theek hai koi problem nahi hai. If you want to visit aap yaha pe bhi visit kar sakte hain basically office aa sakte hain jo bhi aapko kuch changes vagera dekhna hai kaam kaise kis tarike se ho raha hai. Vishal ji agar koi bhi doubt hai direct office. IndiaMART use kar chuka hu mere ko koi issue nahi hai IndiaMART se lekin mam pata hai kya hai aap catalog pe agar working dekhenge na to maine catalog pe khud se working ki hui hai jab first time maine IndiaMART buy kiya tha na aapke matlab particular TrustSeal to mere ko catalog kuch aur mila tha uske baad maine kuch usme aur insert kiya tab iska score itna pahucha hai main aapko clearly bol raha hu ye baat. Second thing mam isme aapke catalog kharab nahi hota ki calls nahi aate mam maine aise aise catalogs dekhe na jiske paas call proper aa raha hai. For example. Agree kar rahi hu. Agree kar rahi hu main deny nahi kar rahi hu hoti hai ye cheeze but kahin na kahin pe issue hai kyunki main jo maine cheez observe kari sir 35 ki rating hai. Mam kahan par issue hai ye aap bas wo cheez agar aap manage kar loge na to mam main video meet ke main har cheez kar lunga mam. Mere liye easy hai mam aap video meet. Wo cheez main. Video meet se mujhe pata hai mam aap mujhe catalog dikhaoge. Ha mujhe pata hai. Basic aur price se related aur mera jo score hai wo visit hoga mera usse zyada kuch bhi nahi hoga. Ji ji maine aapko ha ye ye basic jo issue aa raha hai na sir kahin na kahin ye cheeze bahut impact karti hai hamare catalog pe. Theek hai meri visibility aur listing ko banane ke liye in cheezon ka bahut zyada role hai. Ab aapke jo product hai aap khud dekhiye unki scoring kitni hai 25, 35, 15 is tarike ki scoring hai sir catalog ke upar jiski wajah se bhi sir ye issues aa rahe hain. Kuch kuch products maine na non relevant kar diye hai aap ek baar check kar lijiye catalog matlab kuch products maine hataye hai kyunki wo as it is same the. Haan. Theek hai. Jo inactive hai wo different hai lekin jo active 98 product hai na actually 15 ya 16 product honge jiski specification nahi hogi shayad kyunki usme sara maine insert kar diya tha phir mere paas workload zyada ho gaya to phir main matlab maine abhi buy bhi nahi kiya aap November mein leads dekhenge na leads consume maine bahut kam kiya hai abhi tak kiya hi nahi hai sir maine kiya. Hmm. Hai na to wo wo maine dekh liya sir description aapne proper mention kiya hua hai. No doubt at all. 98 products aa rahe hain jisme se nau product aise hain jisme specification nahi hai, nau price hai, kaiyo pe price nahi hai. To wo sari cheeze hain. Price hum log insert karte hi nahi mam kyunki market ke andar aapko pata hai mam monopoly hoti hai price agar hum log isme insert kar denge to mam phir jo hum log bachana wo bhi nahi bacha sakte. Isliye ye baat hai. Exactly exactly got it got it main uss cheez ke liye nahi bolungi aapko wo theek hai wo aapka call hai aap nahi price dikhana chah rahe hain but at least jo baki ki cheeze hai na sir dekho har product pe minimum teen teen image ka rehna kafi zaruri hai pehli cheez. Main kar deta hu na. Haan aap product ki images vagera share kijiye theek hai specification ek baar main discuss karwa ke jab aap available ho paaye aap tab bataiye uss time pe hum log is cheez ko changes karke add on karte hain. Theek hai. Ab meri ek request bhi Vishal ji aapka na yaha pe concern open hai last do dinon se. Haan ji. Theek hai you are satisfied. Main concern jab close uss time pe karunga jab meri cheez proper ho jayegi main aapko ye clearly bol raha hu kyunki yaha se agar okay ho jate hain na mam uske baad wo cheez nahi hoti main ye kar chuka hu do se teen baar aap bol rahe ho na aapka 6 November ko hua tha to wo maine mam close isliye kiya tha kyunki call thi samne mam ki jo mere samne shayad aap call kar rahe ho kisi aur ne bhi call kiya hoga maybe to unki call thi ki mam sir aap clearly bata dijiye maine kaha theek hai mere ko theek laga tha thoda sa tha lekin ab main concern jab close karunga jab meri cheeze clear ho jayengi aapko jo bhi cheez chahiye aap mujhe de dena main aapko de dunga wo images chahiye images share kar dunga. Theek hai. Koi dikkat nahi hai main ek baar na jaise Parul nahi hai to main dusre account manager ko bolti hu she will be in touch with you aap mujhe sari images bhej dijiye main yaha pe kaam shuru karati hu you don't worry about it. Haan theek hai mere ko WhatsApp zarur kar dijiyega okay. Bilkul mam bilkul kar deta hu ye aapne WhatsApp pe hide kiya hua hai na main isliye images share kar deta hu. Haan haan haan theek theek hai okay. Okay thank you. Thank you.
summary:
\n
Concerns:\n
- No buyleads after August.
- Leads disappear quickly; unable to buy.
- Catalog score is low; needs improvement.
- Only one photo per product.\n
Resolution:\n
- Executive explained catalog gaps impact buyleads.
- Executive shared WhatsApp number for image sharing.
- Executive will assign another account manager.\n
Next Steps: \n
- Customer to share images on WhatsApp.
- Executive to assign new account manager.\n
Alert (If Any):\n
None\n
@@@Sentiment:\n
- Angry -> Satisfied\n
\n
@@@Key Topics:\n
- buyleads, catalog, images, subscription, trustseal\n
\n
